articles.title: Star Trek : Discovery casts Spock! - moviehole.net
articles.description: The character made famous by Leonard Nimoy returns to the small screen
articles.content:
Ethan Peck, best know for playing Heath Ledger’s part in the “10 Things I Hate About You” TV series, will play a young Spock on CBS All Access’s “Star Trek : Discovery”.
